Interface RMAuthentication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Authentication, Loggable, Serializable

    public interface RMAuthentication
extends Authentication
    Authentication interface of the resource manager.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        ResourceManager login(Credentials credentials)
               throws LoginException
        Performs the user authentication into the resource manager.
        Parameters:
        credentials - - user encrypted login and password
        Returns:
        the resource manager interface if the login is successful
        Throws:
        LoginException - if user does not exist or password is incorrect
